messages.zh: 第二十关（后）
messages.en: level 20(post)

messages.zh: 近卫局的护送队已经安全离开了。
messages.en: The Guard Bureau’s escort team has left safely.

messages.zh: 而敌人嘛——暂时也不打算放过我们的样子。
messages.en: And the enemies——don’t seem to want to let us go for now.

messages.zh: 只要敌人还不知道米莎被近卫局接走，他们越把注意力放在我们身上，米莎那边就越安全。
messages.en: As long as the enemies don’t know that Misha is picked up by the Guard Bureau, they’ll keep their attention on us, and the safer Misha will be.

messages.zh: 其实，为什么龙门和整合运动都要找这个孩子？
messages.en: You know, why are Lungmen and Reunion Movement both after this child?

messages.zh: 不清楚，可能性很多。
messages.en: I don’t know, there are many possibilities.

messages.zh: 我能想到的是，这孩子本人，或者只有她知情的什么东西......足以影响——甚至，左右龙门的安危。
messages.en: What I can think of this, this child herself, or something only she knows……is enough to affect——or even, decide Lungmen’s safety.

messages.zh: 东西？
messages.en: Something?

messages.zh: 是的，也许米莎与这样东西的联系只有她自己明白，所以龙门和整合运动都必须得到她。
messages.en: Yes, maybe only Misha understands the connection between this thing and her, that’s why both Lungmen and Reunion Movement must get her.

messages.zh: ——真是危险的较量。
messages.en: ——What a dangerous contest.

messages.zh: 不管是米莎、我们还是近卫局，都无法置身其外。
messages.en: Be it Misha, us or the Guard Bureau, none can stand out of this.

messages.zh: 陈长官那里......
messages.en: Officer Ch’en……

messages.zh: 我有预感。事情不会这么简单就结束。
messages.en: I have a feeling. Things won’t end this easily.

messages.zh: 阿米娅，我们还有什么任务吗？
messages.en: Amiya, any other mission for us?

messages.zh: 希望你们能继续进行侦查活动，调查整合运动对这里的渗透情况。
messages.en: I want you to continue investigating, find out more about Reunion Movement’s infiltration into this place.

messages.zh: 我们虽然已经把米莎交给了近卫局，但整合运动......依然让我感到些许不安。
messages.en: We have handed Misha to the Guard Bureau already, but Reunion Movement……still makes me feel uneasy.

messages.zh: 好说~那我们走了~
messages.en: Got it~off we go then~

messages.zh: 嗯，交给你们了。
messages.en: Yes. I’ll trust this to you.

messages.zh: 各位，我们不知道还有多少整合运动在这里潜伏。
messages.en: Everyone, we don’t know how many Reunion Movement are lurking around here.

messages.zh: 做好准备，不要放松警惕。
messages.en: Be prepared, and don’t let your guards down.

messages.zh: 明白！
messages.en: Understood!

messages.zh: 塔露拉。
messages.en: Talulah.

messages.zh: 一切都已安排妥当。
messages.en: Everything’s ready now.

messages.zh: 不错。该动身了。
messages.en: Good. It’s time to go.
——speak.

messages.zh: 进攻龙门对于整合运动，确实有战略性的意义。
messages.en: Attacking Lungmen, is strategically significant for Reunion Movement indeed.

messages.zh: 拿下龙门，整合运动能获得种种优势。
messages.en: Capturing Lungmen, can give Reunion Movement all kinds of advantages.

messages.zh: 但是风险与代价都很高。
messages.en: But both the risks and prices are high.

messages.zh: ——为什么那么执着？
messages.en: ——Why so persistent?

messages.zh: 你看见那座建筑物了吗。
messages.en: Do you see that building.

messages.zh: 我看得见。
messages.en: I see it.

messages.zh: 那是龙门的象征。也是——
messages.en: That is the symbol of Lungmen. And also——

messages.zh: 我回到这里，不仅是要夺回本属于感染者的一切。
messages.en: I came back here, not only to take back everything that should have belonged to the Infected.

messages.zh: 我还要让他——付出代价。
messages.en: But also to——let him pay.

messages.zh: 而且——你难道不觉得，这一切也很有趣吗？
messages.en: And besides——don’t you think, that this is all very interesting as well?

messages.zh: 对吧，塔露拉——？
messages.en: Right, talulah——?
